Server.Service

Class Receptionist

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.concurrent.Service<User>
      • Server.Service.Receptionist
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.concurrent.Worker<User>, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class Receptionist
extends javafx.concurrent.Service<User>
    This Class represents the service that is used to initiate the connection for every user that logs onto the server. Created by RAIDER on 08.05.2015.
